v gud - scarey - stabby stab - dashi run run run
no se hace nada repetitivo ya que los asesinos y supervivientes tiene diferentes modos de jugar por cada persona, esto logra que ninguna partida sea igual que la anterior
que poronga la nueva actualizacion, ya no me corre
muito divertido quando jogado com amigos
If you have friends, it's pretty fun. If you don't, it may be frustrating to learn, but practice is rewarded.

Un juego demasiado divertido, para reirse y pasar un buen rato con los compas como sobrevivientes o disfrutando el placer de jugar en solitario persiguiendo a los sobrevivientes. Totalmente recomendado.
falta comunica√ß√£o, mas e mt bom o jogo

fun and addicting but terribly balanced, ironically the killers suffer more then the survivors. if you want to have a challenging and rewarding experience, play killer, its basically daycare. if you want a laid back and relaxing time, play survivor, your team MIGHT have your back. lots of technique and strategy to learn here that sometimes translates to other games. also, although jarring at the beginning, the game is not scary. it devolves from a horror game being chased by a killer to an asymmetrical team game.
Muy bueno la verdad vale al pena comprarlo
good game but hit box dum so yes

recomendaria muito, as vezes da um cagasso violento, mas de primeira s√≥, apesar de ser um pouco pesado, faz minhas noites ficarem com uma cara de safada. Eu adoraria que ele estivesse vivo ainda, porem com as poucas pessoas da pra se divertir. Compre essa merda, e nao tenha medo
If you can manage to get a group or even just another friend playing it is really fun
es muy vicioso y realmente buenisimo
Unique game that keeps me coming back
jogo bom, mas tras odio em pensamentos de desgraca
2 horas para encontrar partida: El juego
I love this game, I have over 800 hours on console. The PC experience is amazing, still glitches now and again but the game itself is so addictive.

I've played this game for over 300 hours, and according to many other people's playtimes, I've barely even scratched the surface. Considering the fact that me and many other people have poured so much time into this broken and at times unfun game shows that most of the time, it is very fun. It certainly has a learning curve that you'll have to get used to, maybe have to watch a guide or two, but after that, it's a fun ride throughout. Until you get toxic players. Gg ez.
im slowly losing my sanity playing this game, but i cant stop playing

This game is a huge money grab, playing as killer feels...ok I guess, playing as survivor feels tedious. Ff you are found as a survivor you just have to run around until the killer eventually (which they always do) catches up to you and then you have to rely on other players to save you, which most times they don't... or that's the game for you then.

Great game. Killers have a clear advantage if you're new to the game though. Once you progress further and learn more about the strategies and get used to the maps playing as a survivor becomes much more fun.
It's a great game! Thrilling and addicting

at first its hard to get into but once you get about 4-6 hours in you really start to feel comfortable and enjoy the game a lot.

Overall the gameplay and format of what to do in-game is not a lot, but it can be rewarding to win on either side. Games can be either very fast paced or very slow depending on the type of killer/map. It's super fun to play survivor with friends, as the anxiety inducing chases really turn this game into chaos sometimes and it's amazing. Playing as a killer is also rewarding, mind gaming people as a killer is always a blast.

this game so much fun. at least i think it is and tens of thousands of other people do as well. it can be fun in two ways. playing just a few matches a day every day. like have for years on xbox one. or binge play. like i have now that im on pc. if u can except the fact that you will not survive every game you play. cause some killers are just to damn  good. or there face camping scrubs. either way if u laugh or rage on this game. chances are you will come back for more
